au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: AgBE_L2=1.5m_central
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(700,0) # Drive guide to g5 driveGuide(guideConfig.g5) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g7) driveEntRotAp(180) #beamstop command removed in this config #selBs(1) # set beamcentres #beamcenterx 96.9 #beamcenterz 96.2
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(27.5, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(330)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(27.5, 0) driveBsz(260)
